Player History
Signed as a free agent by Pittsburgh on 4/1/1985 to a 1-year deal worth $300,000 per year...
Had first career hit on 7/11/1989, off Chuck Cary (STL)...
2/2/1990: Gets a new one-year contract worth $350,000 through salary arbitration...
Earned first career win on 5/1/1990...
2/2/1991: Gets a new one-year contract worth $350,000 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 6/19/1991 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from Pittsburgh to Seattle on 6/24/1991 (Going to PIT: P Clay Parker. Going to SEA: P Scott Bailes, P Barry Jones, P Shawn Holman, P Scott Radinsky, CF Chad Curtis)...
